notes.note: cloud-init: extra ssh keys added to authorized_keys on the Azure platform

reference.description: bz#1680165: CVE-2019-0816 cloud-init: extra ssh keys added to authorized_keys on the Azure platform

remediation.description:
For details on how to apply this update, refer to:
https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258

note: An update for cloud-init is now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.

The cloud-init packages provide a set of init scripts for cloud instances. Cloud instances need special scripts to run during initialization to retrieve and install SSH keys, and to let the user run various scripts.
Users of cloud-init are advised to upgrade to these updated packages.
